item.title: Normal magic
item.dc:creator: @BamBam BamBam
item.description:
@BamBam wrote:

i don’t know exactly what your looking for… maybe this will help? it has all the reg spells, god spells, all the entangle shit i removed, teleblock is in there, never tested Iban so i couldn’t tell ya.

hope thats what your looking for.

Source: PVPScape

search for this

/*NORMAL SPELLS START HERE*/

then add this under it…

if (spellID == 1152) { // Wind Strike
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(90, 95, 92, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 1);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(2);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1154) { // Water Strike
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(93, 94, 95, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 5);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(4);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1156) { // Earth Strike
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(96, 97, 98, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 9);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(6);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1158) { // Fire Strike
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(99, 100, 101, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 13);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(8);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1160) { // Wind bolt
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(117, 118, 119, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 17);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(9);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1163) { // Water bolt
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(120, 121, 122, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 23);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(10);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1166) { // Earth bolt
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(123, 124, 125, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 29);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(11);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1169) { // Fire bolt
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(126, 127, 128, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 35);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(12);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1172) { // Wind blast
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(132, 133, 134, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 41);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(13);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1175) { // Water blast
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(135, 136, 137, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 47);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(14);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1177) { // Earth blast
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(138, 139, 140, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 53);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(15);
PkingDelay = 3;
}
if (spellID == 1181) { // Fire blast
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(129, 130, 131, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 59);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(16);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1183) { // Wind wave
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(158, 159, 160, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 62);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(17);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1185) { // Water wave
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(161, 162, 163, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 65);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(18);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1188) { // Earth wave
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(164, 165, 166, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 70);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(19);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if (spellID == 1189) { // Fire wave
meStill();
ProjectileSpellPlayer(155, 156, 157, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, index, EnemyY, EnemyX, 75);
hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20);
PkingDelay = 3;
}

if(spellID == 1190) { // sara strike
	if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2415) {
		if(charge >= 1) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
		}
		if(charge == 0) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20);
		}
		castOnPlayer.saraTimer = 4;
		castOnPlayer.inCombat();
		inCombat();
		PkingDelay = 3; 
		meStill();
		startAnimation(811);
	}
	else {
		sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Sara staff to cast this spell.");
		meStill();
		startAnimation(0);
	}
}

if(spellID == 1191) { // claws of guthix
	if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2416) {
		if(charge >= 1) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
		}
		if(charge == 0) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20);
		}
		castOnPlayer.guthixTimer = 5;
		castOnPlayer.inCombat();
		inCombat();
		PkingDelay = 3;
		meStill();
		startAnimation(811);
	}
	else {
		sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Guthix staff to cast this spell.");
		meStill();
		startAnimation(0);
	}
}

if(spellID == 1192) { // flames of zammy
	if(playerLevel[6] >= 60 && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2417) {
		if(charge >= 1) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(30);
		}
		if(charge == 0) {
			hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(20);
		}
		castOnPlayer.zammyTimer = 6;
		castOnPlayer.inCombat();
		inCombat();
		PkingDelay = 3;
		meStill();
		startAnimation(811);
	}
	else {
		sendMessage("You need a magic level of 60 and a Zammy staff to cast this spell.");
		meStill();
		startAnimation(0);
	}
}

if(spellID == 12445) { //teleblock (lvl 85 spell)
	if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == true && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 85) {
		sendMessage("This player is currently immune to teleblock.");
		startAnimation(0);
		meStill();
	}
	if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == true && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == true && playerLevel[6] >= 85) {
		sendMessage("This player is already affected by this spell.");
		startAnimation(0);
		meStill();
	}
	if(castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock() == false && castOnPlayer.checkTeleblock2() == false && playerLevel[6] >= 85) {
		startAnimation(1819);
		castOnPlayer.Teleblock();
		castOnPlayer.inCombat();
		inCombat();
		PkingDelay = 3;
		meStill();
	}
	if(playerLevel[6] <= 84) {
		sendMessage("You need a magic level of 85 to cast this spell.");
		startAnimation(0);
		meStill();
	}
}
